//: This would cast an AoE entangle on impact if I can find a way to do that. Until then, single target.
description: An arrow with a fragment of a druid rune in the arrowhead. It unleashes a storm of slowing vegetation on its target.
An arrow with a fragment of a stormshaper rune in the arrowhead. It trails lightning and explodes with a crash of thunder.
An arrow with a fragment of a earthshaper rune in the arrowhead. It hits the target with the force of an avalanche.
An arrow with a fragment of a kelvinist rune in the arrowhead. It explodes into a firestorm.
A disturbing bone arrow with a fragment of a biomancer rune in the arrowhead. It showers its target in acid.
A metallic arrow with a fragment of a technomancer rune in the arrowhead. It destroys electronic targets.
